item.title: Hugo command
item.author: 作者
item.description: It’s must be in the install blog path. e.g. /home/jxie/blog 1. Start local server $ hugo server then you can in brose by localhost:1313 see the local bolg. or use: $ hugo server --disableFastRender to live your editing of the page. 2. Create a new post $ hugo new posts/Hugo.md
